TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract RibbonGroup implements class Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent, class System.ComponentModel.IComponent, class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 表示功能区选项卡上的一组控件。

span.span: Represents a group of controls on a Ribbon tab.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将**组**控件从 "**工具箱**" 的 " **Office 功能区控件**" 选项卡拖动到功能区设计器上时, Visual Studio 将创建一个对象。Visual Studio creates a object when you drag a **Group** control from the **Office Ribbon Controls** tab of the **Toolbox** onto the Ribbon Designer. ## 常规任务Common Tasks 下表列出了可用于常见任务的成员。The following table lists members that are useful for common tasks. 所有这些任务都可以在设计时执行。All of these tasks can be performed at design time. 在加载功能区之前, 可以在运行时执行这些任务中的一些任务。Some of these tasks can be performed at run time before the Ribbon is loaded. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview)。For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview). |任务Task|成员Member| |----------|------------| |访问组中的控件、将控件添加到组或从组中移除控件。Access the controls in the group, add controls to the group, or remove controls from the group.|使用 属性。Use the property.| |向功能区选项卡中添加组。Add a group to a Ribbon tab.|将添加 到选项卡的集合。Add a to the collection of the tab.| |相对于内置组的位置, 在内置选项卡上指定组的位置。Specify the location of a group on a built-in tab, relative to the location of a built-in group.|使用 属性。Use the property.| 您可以通过使用 对象的方法在运行时创建。You can create a at run time by using the method of the object. 可通过两种方法来访问 对象：There are two ways to access the object: - 通过使用 Ribbon 类的 `Factory` 属性。By using the `Factory` property of the Ribbon class. 可从 Ribbon 类中的代码使用此方法。Use this approach from code in your Ribbon class. - 通过使用 `Globals.Factory.GetRibbonFactory` 方法。By using the `Globals.Factory.GetRibbonFactory` method. 可从 Ribbon 类外的代码使用此方法。Use this approach from code outside your Ribbon class. [!INCLUDE[vsto_interface](~/includes/vsto-interface-md.md)] ## 用法Usage [!INCLUDE[vsto_net35mref](~/includes/vsto-net35mref-md.md)]

summary.span: 获取或设置与组关联的功能区对话启动程序。

span.span: Gets or sets the Ribbon dialog launcher that is associated with the group.

value.span: 与组关联的功能区对话启动程序。

span.span: The Ribbon dialog launcher that is associated with the group.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 功能区对话框启动器是出现在组中的一个小图标。The Ribbon dialog launcher is a small icon that appears in the group. 当用户单击此图标时, 可以处理该事件, 以打开自定义对话框。When the user clicks this icon, you can handle the event to open a custom dialog box. 默认情况下, 组没有功能区对话框启动器。By default, groups do not have a Ribbon dialog launcher. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：向功能区组](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-add-a-dialog-box-launcher-to-a-ribbon-group)添加对话框启动器。For more information, see [How to: Add a Dialog Box Launcher to a Ribbon Group](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-add-a-dialog-box-launcher-to-a-ribbon-group). 您可以通过使用接口的属性来自定义功能区对话框启动器的行为。You can customize the behavior of the Ribbon dialog launcher by using properties of the interface. 例如, 若要设置当用户将指针移到对话框启动器图标上时显示的屏幕提示, 请使用属性。For example, to set the screen tip that appears when the user moves the pointer over the dialog launcher icon, use the property. 接口的某些属性 (如属性) 仅当最终用户将其添加到快速访问工具栏时才适用。Some properties of the interface, such as the property, are only applicable when the end user adds it to the Quick Access Toolbar. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在添加到默认组的上设置和属性。The following example shows how to set the and properties on the that is added to the default group. 若要运行此代码示例, 必须首先执行以下步骤:To run this code example, you must first perform the following steps: 1. 向 Office 项目添加 "**功能区 (可视化设计器)** " 项。Add a **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item to an Office project. 2. 向默认组`Group1`添加[, 如如何: 向功能区组](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-add-a-dialog-box-launcher-to-a-ribbon-group)添加对话框启动器。Add a to the default group `Group1` as outlined in [How to: Add a Dialog Box Launcher to a Ribbon Group](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-add-a-dialog-box-launcher-to-a-ribbon-group). [!code-csharp[Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties#11](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties/CS/Ribbon1.cs#11)] [!code-vb[Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties#11](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties/VB/Ribbon1.vb#11)]

summary.span: 在用户单击组中的功能区对话启动程序时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the user clicks the Ribbon dialog launcher icon in the group.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 功能区对话框启动器是出现在组中的一个小图标。The Ribbon dialog launcher is a small icon that appears in the group. 当用户单击此图标时, 可以处理该事件, 以打开自定义对话框。When the user clicks this icon, you can handle the event to open a custom dialog box. 默认情况下, 组没有功能区对话框启动器。By default, groups do not have a Ribbon dialog launcher. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：向功能区组](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-add-a-dialog-box-launcher-to-a-ribbon-group)添加对话框启动器。For more information, see [How to: Add a Dialog Box Launcher to a Ribbon Group](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-add-a-dialog-box-launcher-to-a-ribbon-group). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何向功能区组添加对话框启动器, 以及如何启动一个自定义对话框, 使用户可以在单击右下角的图标时选择高级设置。The following example shows how to add a dialog box launcher to a ribbon group and how to launch a custom dialog that enables users to choose advanced settings when they click on the icon in the lower right corner of the . 若要运行此代码示例, 必须首先执行以下步骤:To run this code example, you must first perform the following steps: 1. 向 Office 项目添加 "**功能区 (可视化设计器)** " 项。Add a **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item to an Office project. 2. 向默认组添加[ ,如如何:向功能区组](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-add-a-dialog-box-launcher-to-a-ribbon-group)添加对话框启动器。Add a to the default group as outlined in [How to: Add a Dialog Box Launcher to a Ribbon Group](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-add-a-dialog-box-launcher-to-a-ribbon-group). 3. 如果使用 Visual Basic, 请将一个新的 Windows 窗体**对话框**项添加到项目。If you are using Visual Basic, add a new Windows Form **Dialog** item to the project. C#如果使用的是, 请添加一个新的**Windows 窗体**项并将其转换为对话框, 方法是向窗体添加 **"确定" 和 "** **取消**" 按钮, 并为按钮的 click 事件创建事件处理程序。If you are using C#, add a new **Windows Form** item and turn it into a dialog by adding an **OK** and **Cancel** button to the form and creating event handlers for the buttons' click events. 4. 将对话框的 " **(Name)** " 属性设置`advancedSettingsDialog`为。Set the **(Name)** property of the dialog to `advancedSettingsDialog`. 您可以通过添加控件和设置更多属性来自定义该对话框。You can customize the dialog by adding controls and setting more properties. 5. 向代码添加事件处理程序。 Add the event handler to your code. 6. 将以下方法的内容放置到事件处理程序中。Place the contents of the following method into the event handler. [!code-csharp[Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties#10](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties/CS/Ribbon1.Designer.cs#10)] [!code-vb[Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties#10](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties/VB/Ribbon1.Designer.vb#10)]

summary.span: 获取一个标识当前组的字符串。

span.span: Gets a string that identifies the current group.

value.span: 一个标识当前组的字符串。

span.span: A string that identifies the current group.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下, 属性具有与属性相同的值。By default, the property has the same value as the property. 如果没有为属性指定任何值, 则 Visual Studio 将为属性生成一个值。If no value is specified for the property, then Visual Studio generates a value for the property. 对象中的所有组件都必须具有`Id`唯一的属性值。All components in an object must have unique `Id` property values. 属性对应于功能区 XML 文件中组件的属性。`id` The property corresponds to the `id` attribute of components in the Ribbon XML file.

span.span: Gets the controls in the group.
The collection of controls in the group.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以在运行时将功能区控件添加到组, 但只能在加载功能区之前添加。You can add a Ribbon control to a group at run time, but only before the Ribbon is loaded. 创建控件的实例, 然后将新控件添加到集合中。Create an instance of the control, and then add the new control to the collection. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview)。For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview). 使用功能区设计器将控件添加到组中时, Visual Studio 会自动将控件添加到组的属性。When you add controls to a group by using the Ribbon Designer, Visual Studio automatically adds the controls to the property of the group.

exception.span: 加载功能区后，尝试添加、移除或替换 。

span.span: You try to add, remove, or replace a after the Ribbon is loaded.

summary.span: 获取或设置组的键盘快捷键。

span.span: Gets or sets the keyboard shortcut of the group.

value.span: 一个表示该组的键盘快捷键的字符串。

span.span: A string that represents the keyboard shortcut of the group.

remarks.format: ## Remarks KeyTip 必须有1到3个字符, 并且不得包含空格、制表符或换行符。A KeyTip must have from 1 to 3 characters, and must not contain spaces, tabs, or newline characters. Keytip 有时称为 "访问键" 或 "加速器", 用作激活控件的快捷键组合。KeyTips are sometimes known as access keys or accelerators and are used as shortcut key combinations that activate controls. 按 ALT 键时, 功能区上将显示键提示。KeyTips appear on the Ribbon when you press the ALT key. 如果 KeyTip 与内置控件或其他外接程序的 keytip 发生冲突, Microsoft Office 可能会自动分配不冲突的 KeyTip 值。If your KeyTip conflicts with KeyTips for built-in controls or from other add-ins, Microsoft Office might assign non-conflicting KeyTip values automatically. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[使用键盘处理功能区程序](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=93523)。For more information, see [Use the keyboard to work with Ribbon programs](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=93523).

summary.span: 获取或设置组标签所显示的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text that is displayed by the label of the group.

value.span: 通过组标签显示的文本。

span.span: The text that is displayed by the label of the group.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 标签显示在组的底部。The label appears at the bottom of the group. 标签应是一个简短短语, 描述组中控件的集体功能。The label should be a brief phrase that describes the collective functionality of the controls on the group.

summary.span: 获取或设置内置选项卡上的组的位置（相对于选项卡上的内置组）。

span.span: Gets or sets the position of a group on a built-in tab, relative to a built-in group on the tab.

value.span: 一个 ，表示组的位置（相对于选项卡上的内置组）。

span.span: A that represents the position of the group, relative to a built-in group on the tab.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当组在内置选项卡上时, 属性才有效果。有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：自定义内置选项卡](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-customize-a-built-in-tab)。The property has an effect only if the group is on a built-in tab. For more information, see [How to: Customize a Built-in Tab](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-customize-a-built-in-tab). 只能在加载功能区之前设置属性。The property can be set only before the Ribbon is loaded. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview)。For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview).

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示组是否可见。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the group is visible.

value.span: 如果组可见，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the group is visible; otherwise, .
